text: Enemy Mine is a 1985 American German science fiction drama movie directed by Wolfgang Petersen and based on the novella of the same name by Barry B. Longyear. It stars Dennis Quaid, Louis Gossett Jr., Brion James, Carolyn McCormick and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was a box office bomb and has since become a cult classic. ==Other websites== * * Category:1985 drama movies Category:1985 science fiction movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American drama movies Category:German science fiction movies Category:German drama movies Category:Movies about extraterrestrial life Category:Movies set in the 21st century Category:Movies set on fictional planets Category:Movies directed by Wolfgang Petersen Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Enemy Mine (movie)
